items.sentence: Let\'s go out and do something interesting today.
I spent the whole evening trying to find my keys.
I think it was Tom that I saw getting on the bus.
I\'ll definitely sing that song sometime tonight.
I\'m afraid that I took your umbrella by mistake.
I can\'t walk away from an opportunity like this.
Tom could tell us what needs to be done, I think.
What are the chances that Tom will actually come?
What does a guy have to do to get your attention?
Tom tells me you\'re better at French than he is.
